SELECT ta.id, ta.department_id AS departmentId, ta.employee_id AS employeeId, ta.no, ta.serial_number AS serialNumber, ta.name, te.name AS employeeName, td.name AS departmentName FROM t_asset ta LEFT JOIN t_employee te ON ta.employee_id = te.id LEFT JOIN t_department td ON td.id = ta.department_id
and te.name LIKE concat('%',#{param.employeeName},'%')
AND td.name LIKE concat('%',#{param.departmentName},'%')
AND ta.no LIKE concat('%',#{param.no},'%')
AND ta.serial_number LIKE concat('%',#{param.serialNumber},'%')
AND ta.name LIKE concat('%',#{param.name},'%')
AND ta.enabled = #{param.enabled}
